message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this great product for $110. I think you'll really love it!
Hi Alice, thanks for the offer. I appreciate it, but I'm looking to pay a bit less. Would you be willing to accept $105 for the product?
I appreciate your interest in the product, Bob. However, I'm not sure I can go as low as $105. Would you be willing to meet me in the middle at $108?
